title: Erigon halted
body:
#### System information

Commit hash : a9bde213d9537bdae31e2a4a7427acf45be8481d
Network: mainnet

Restarting resulted in the same error and logs.
Reverting to 2c1d617b41d626642a7cba5d5d2c495a516cfd31 fixed the issue.

I am running a Consensus Layer (Lighthouse) and I figure this message is just because the Beacon Chain is not yet synced that Erigon is stopped. 
Any thoughts on this from more informed uses?
